bot:
I searched to see if np.matmult is the same as @. No, np.matmult and @ are not the same, but they both perform matrix multiplication in Python. np.matmult is a function from the NumPy library specifically for matrix multiplication, while @ is an operator introduced in Python 3.5 that can also be used for matrix multiplication. Both will yield the same result when used with compatible arrays. 

Could you please provide me with the details of the courses you want to take?
